name: Evacuation (itch)
description:
Whether it's a wildfire, hurricane or flood, natural disasters can be sudden — and extremely dangerous. Evacuation takes you through the steps of collecting necessary items for your evacuation "go-bag," as recommended by the Department of Homeland Security's Ready program. We recommend you play using a 1024x768 screen resolution.

Game produced by Sydney Maki and Taylor Transtrum in the Walter Cronkite School of Journalism's New Media Innovation Lab.
